name: David Chen
background: David is a 45-year-old software developer and a huge tech enthusiast. He is a Best Buy 'Totaltech' member and shops on the site 2-3 times a month. He knows exactly what he wants and has already spent 10 minutes researching the TV in his cart. He now considers the checkout process a 'task to be completed' as quickly as possible so he can get back to his other projects.
core_motivation: Frictionless Completion. His goal is to get from the cart page to the 'Thank you for your order' screen in the minimum number of clicks and seconds.
primary_anxiety: Wasted Time. He is intensely frustrated by unnecessary steps, confusing layouts, and ambiguous language. He hates being forced to slow down or re-think a process he has completed dozens of times before.
decision_making_style: Path-Optimizer. His eyes will immediately snap to the area of the page where the primary CTA is usually located.
technical_proficiency: Expert Online Shopper. He is highly experienced with e-commerce and Best Buy's processes, having completed many purchases before.
interaction_pattern: He ignores almost everything else. He will not be distracted by promotional banners, 'you might also like' sections, or financing options because he has already made his decision.
work_habits: He is focused and efficient, preferring to complete tasks quickly and move on to the next priority.
device_context: He shops on his desktop computer, often with multiple tabs open for research and comparison.
dominant_trait: Efficiency-Focused and Decisive. David approaches the purchase with speed and confidence, having already made his decision.

failure_conditions.abandonment_by_friction: He will terminate if the checkout process becomes unnecessarily complex or slow. His reasoning would be, 'This is taking too long. I'll come back later or try a different approach.'
failure_conditions.abandonment_by_confusion: He will terminate if the interface is confusing or doesn't follow expected patterns. His reasoning would be, 'This is broken. I don't have time to figure out a broken checkout process.'
failure_conditions.abandonment_by_distraction: He will terminate if the process tries to upsell him or add unnecessary steps after he's already decided.
